name: FriendPages
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A special version of Class.Pages that contains information about a player's
  connections.
description: |
  FriendPages is a special version of Class.Pages returned by
  Class.Players:GetFriendsAsync(). The items contained within include
  information about a player's connections and have the following structure:



  Name
  Type
  Description


  DisplayName
  string
  The current display name of the connection.


  Id
  int64
  The user ID of the connection.


  Username
  string
  The username of the connection.



  See the code samples for how to iterate over a player's connections.
codesamples:
  - print-roblox-friends

  - Pages
